version_description:
Slight performance optimization when open a book in EPUB,MOBI,FB2,KB format.
Small changes in the display styles for FB2,KB.
Added an ability to completely remove the margins in EPUB,MOBI,FB2,KB books.
Added an option for choosing of the interaction method with the content in a book by tapping or long pressing in EPUB,MOBI,FB2,KB.
Added support for some EPUB3 features.
Added highlighting of a footnote window borders in books with dark themes.
Added an ability to apply settings for an individual book.
Improved support of CSS in EPUB,MOBI,FB2,KB.
Improved selection of text in the books.
Improved rendering for books with languages written in a Right-To-Left (Arabic, Hebrew).
Fixed a bug with the inability to bookmark in certain cases in EPUB,MOBI,FB2,KB.
Fixed an issue when view an image from the books at full screen.
Fixed certain problems with the cards visualization in the Files section.

Please share your impressions about the new version on the Support screen.
Send us your comments and suggestions.
And do not forget to update your reviews, thank you.

Improved support of the metadata in DjVu.
Slight performance optimization when open DjVu in scroll mode.
Changed the rendering of DjVu pages.
Improved the zooming of DjVu pages.
Added a progressive rendering of DjVu pages (off by default).
Added an ability to choose the zooming mode of DjVu pages.
Fixed a rare issue when impossible to bookmark DjVu page in the certain cases.
Fixed an issue with navigation to a selected text in DjVu page in the some cases.
Redesign of a speech synthesis settings screen.
Now changing of a speech synthesis settings will be applied right away.
Added an ability to apply settings for an individual DjVu book.
Added a setting to display in the footer the number of pages left in a chapter.

Please share your impressions about the new version on the Support screen.
Send us your comments and suggestions.
And do not forget to update your reviews, thank you.

Fixed an issue with restoring of the in-app purchases.

Please share your impressions about the new version on the Support screen.
Send us your comments and suggestions.
And do not forget to update your reviews, thank you.

Improved support of the metadata in PDF.
Changed the rendering of PDF pages.
Improved the zooming of PDF pages.
Added an ability to choose the zooming mode of PDF pages.
Added a feature to choose the display of the added annotations in PDF file.
Improved the text selection in PDF.
Improved support of speech synthesis in PDF.
Fixed an issue with missing or incomplete outline (TOC) in some PDFs.
Fixed an issue with navigation to a selected text in PDF page in the some cases.
Added an ability to apply settings for an individual PDF.
Fixed various issues with the text selection.
Fixed an issue with the notes in PDF and DjVu book in the double-page mode.
Fixed certain issues potentially leading to the application crash.
Added display of filenames when choosing a cover or background in the images folder.

Thank you for using KyBook!
Please remember to update your reviews.

Added an ability to see reviews for some OPDS catalogs.
Fixed an issue with the proper error reporting after failing to post a message on VK.com.
Improved the text selection function.
Fixed an issue with text selection in the some PDF.
Fixed a rare crash when select a text in PDF.
Fixed a rare crash after screen rotation during reading.
Added support for the fast text selection in PDF, DjVu.
Improved the fast text selection feature.
Improved support of the searching in certain OPDS catalogs.
Improved support of the DjVu metadata.
Fixed an issue when unable to place a bookmark on PDF page with no text.
Added an ability to mark a book as read.
Added sorting mode by the reading progress in Books.
Added an ability to add the feedback about a book via a book card.
Added a feature to enable word counting in EPUB, MOBI, FB2 books.
Added an ability to change the color of a bookmark.

Thank you for using KyBook!

Please remember to update your reviews.
Share your impressions about the new version on the application site kybook-reader.com or send feedback by e-mail.

Redesigned search in the Files section.
Added an ability to update a folder in the Files via the pull-to-refresh gesture.
Added an ability to reset the subfolder settings into the parent's folder settings.
Added a sidebar with the siblings folders in the Files section in a landscape orientation.
Added a feature to grouping by author/series in the Files section.
Fixed a bug with recursive coping of a folder into itself.
Fixed an issue when unable to open certain FB2 and CBR books from the Cloud Storage.
Improved support for some OPDS catalogs.
Added an ability to edit the reading themes for PDF,DjVu.
Added an ability to specify a gradient background in a theme for EPUB,MOBI,FB2 (the Sand theme includes gradient background by default).
Added support for TAR archives.
Added support for comics in CBT format.
Added selection of permissions to access the files when added Dropbox and Yandex Disk (the connections with different access modes is allowed simultaneously).
Added an ability to share a link to a file in Cloud Storage.
Fixed an issue with accessing to the files in Cloud Storage after the changing of UI language.
Added an ability to change the brightness of the header/footer text when reading.
Added an option to change the monitoring mode of adding files via iTunes File Sharing.
Added an ability to view the current file transfer in the Files and Libraries.
Added an experimental feature for the files synchronization in selected folders between a device and Cloud Storage.
Fixed an issue with the loss of a file during moving it into Cloud Storage if any error occurred.
The operations of copying and moving files from a device to Cloud Storage were a little optimized.
Added a help section on the screen 'Upgrade to Pro'.

Thank you for using KyBook!

Please remember to update your reviews.
Share your impressions about the new version on the application site kybook-reader.com or send feedback by e-mail.

Added support for shared folders on the local network (SMB/CIFS).
Fixed an issue with hanging opening EPUB, FB2 books in some cases.
Fixed several bugs causing crashes.
Removed an ability to select the Inbox folder (readonly) as the destination when copying or moving files.
Improved the synchronization of the books metadata via iCloud.
Added synchronization of bookmarks and notes by the forced synchronization in the open book.
Added an option for disabling updates in the open book when receiving push notifications about changing of a read position, adding or deleting of bookmarks and notes.
Added an option for synchronization of the user's content in the Files/App folder via iCloud.
